title: Turn the Constant into log
text: Use the definition of logarithm, we get $$2=\log_{10}\left(100\right)$$ since $${10}^2=100$$.

title: Match Bases
text: With all term containing same log base, the log can be removed, so it becomes $$x \left(x-15\right)=100$$. $$x^2-15x-100=0$$. We can factor the quadratic as $$\left(x-20\right) \left(x+5\right)=0$$ which has $$x=20$$ and $$x=-5$$ as solutions.

title: Check for Constrains
text: Given $$\log_{a}\left(b\right)$$, b can not be negative. We can omit the negative answer and get $$x=20$$ as the only solution for the equation.
